sub_title: Business Systems Analyst at Western Digital
summary:
Results-oriented business and technology professional with a strong mix of management, information technology and operational business skills.  More than 30 years of varied industry experience in project leadership, business application analysis and development, business process modeling, system implementation, and customer service.  Demonstrates strong communication, presentation, analytical and problem solving skills and is pragmatic.  An effective team leader, building and supporting teams and developing and maintaining strong professional relationships with colleagues and clients locally and remotely in an international environment. 

Has lived and worked in a number of different countries, namely the United States of America, Belgium, Sweden, Netherlands, Austria, and the UK.  Current country of residence is The Netherlands.

profile_positions.description:
After being made redundant in January 2009 owing to a cost reduction scheme, I was invited to return to Western Digital performing the similar job duties as previously which then expanded in scope. In Western Digital’s ERP consolidation and reporting project, I led the local EMEA business team from gathering requirements through to user acceptance testing for the new reporting environment and provided training and support of new customer and product attributes. Provided training to use the new reporting platform, Oracle’s Data Visualization tool.

·	Gather and document reporting requirements for orders, shipments, billings, and revenue data subject areas from the business team sponsors guiding users on go-forward solutions for customers and product.
·	Work with third-party/offshore development team to create standard report templates based on regional requirements and validate reports meet business needs.
·	Test and validate data in standard report templates and data environments working to resolve bugs, issues, and enhancement requests before user acceptance testing.
·	Lead user acceptance testing and to resolve issues with functionality and/or data as well as reviewing and approving enhancement requests.
profile_positions.title: Business Systems Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Managed a number of high impact critical global and regional business intelligence projects by automating reporting solutions to support the sales and operational management of the business (KPI sales reporting, sales, shipments, invoices, forecast, and credit).  Results included increased efficiencies, enhanced understanding of the quarterly business development, and man-hours saved from manual data compilation.
*Gathered and documented project requirements from business sponsors and users and analysed and determined the best data sets to satisfy the reporting requirements.
* Developed prototype tools and processes for proof of concept testing.
* Tested and gained conceptual acceptance and user acceptance by the business users and sponsors.
* Provided business training and support during implementation and for enhancement requests.
profile_positions.title: Sr Manager, Process and Tools

profile_positions.description:
Managed a customer and sales support team of two team leaders and 16 account managers.  Results included implementing a flexible hours working scheme to improve team morale and productivity, increasing customer satisfaction by solving a number of critical customer and process issues, and strengthening the relationships with the sales team and other internal departments.
* Supported the teams to establish and maintain effective customer and sales team relationships by coaching and mentoring and sharing best practices between regional teams.
* Advocated customer concerns and issues and served as escalation point for resolving critical customer issues working with sales, peers, and cross-functional team members.
* Drove process improvements through the regional organisation by participating in cross-functional regional and/or global project teams.
* Recruited, trained, and developed account management staff for assigned area and accounts.
* Maintained a balance workload of resources through evaluation and adjustment of processes, tools, and workload distribution.
profile_positions.title: Sr Manager, EMEA Account Management

profile_positions.description:
Managed a team of 3 technical system engineers and 1 business analyst.  Results included improved communication between regional management and corporate IT through relationship building and maintenance, contributing to a successful implementation of a global ERP upgrade project, and managing and delivering improvements to a number of tools, system, and processes.  Acted as the Regional Logistics Manager for a period of six months to gain additional operations exposure and experience. 
* Gathered and verified business requirements from users as input into creating specifications for amending current systems and tools or creating/purchasing new systems and tools.  
* Wrote functional design and functional specification documents including for existing or new tools based on business requirements
* Created work breakdown structures, timelines, and  identified resources as input into project plans and agreed upon project plans with the business sponsor(s).  Managed projects to agreed scope, timelines, resources, and costs.
* Managed, facilitated, and supported the implementation of new or amended systems through clear communication internally and externally to other Western Digital entities and third party business partners, providing schedules, guidelines, and training.
profile_positions.title: Business Solutions Manager

profile_positions.description:
* Documented as-is high level and detailed business process flows for all areas of the business and documented dependencies and inter-dependencies within and outside the area of focus (internal or external to Western Digital) and data feeds between tools and systems, triggers to tasks or flows, and human interaction and communications.
* Analysed the business process flows for inefficiencies and pro-actively suggested improvements either by modifications to the processes, introducing new ways of working, and/or by suggesting ways to more effectively and efficiently use current or new technology (systems and tools).
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Performed a variety of roles according to the needs of the clients and business, most notably as Project Manager.  Results included delivering a  business-to-business web site to the customer on time and streamlined and structured the internal financial reporting for the programme.
Project Manager, 12 months, Lead PM on a three track client programme
* Led, managed, and motivated a team of 12 to work to the project plan delivering phases on time for a large business-to-business web site rebrand, redesign, and platform upgrade.
* Identified, tracked, and managed risks, issues, and assumptions working with the client project manager and business sponsors.
* Tracked, reported, and managed internal project status and financial reporting.
* Worked closely with the other project managers and sales partner to keep development efforts in synch.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager
